Package probability

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    GaussianMixtureModel
    Class that implements a simple GaussianMixture model as an array of Gaussian distributions.
    GaussianModel
    This class implements a simple Gaussian model of a data distribution.
    KLDivergence
    This class implements the Kullback-Leibler divergence.
    NormalDistributionCalculator
    This class calculates Gaussian probability density and cumulative distribution functions.
    Perplexity
    Perplexity allows us to evaluate the model that we have inferred on the training data by measuring our 'surprise' on the test data, that is - perplexity.
    ProbabilityModel
    This class represents a general probability model.
    VectorQuantization
    A vector quantization approximation of the underlying probability distribution.
